--- page-layout: full title: "Talks and Teaching" echo: false warning: false --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## A Mini Tour of Open-source tools for Transportation Planning & Engineering In November 2023, I gave a talk to University of Windsor chapter of Institute of Transportation Engineers (ITE). The slides are embedded below: ```{=html} ``` ## Scaling Shiny Apps with Google’s Firebase I gave a talk in October 2023 at Windsor Devfest 2023, organized by Google Developers Group Windsor, Ontario. The talk was titled `Catching Fire: Scaling Shiny Apps with Google’s Firebase`. ```{=html} ``` * GitHub: https://github.com/durraniu/gdg * App: https://umair.shinyapps.io/GoogleDevelopersGroupShiny/_w_f3eb35a9/ ## Machine Learning Basics Workshop Series This workshop was held in Winter 2023 for the members of Transportation Systems Innovation Lab at University of Windsor. ## Data Analytics Instructor at St. Clair College ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: - [Capstone Projects (Spring 2022)](https://dab402003.netlify.app/) ## Graduate Assistant at University of Windsor ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
